item.title: Bulletin updated at 07:02 HKT 01/04/2022
item.description:
At 7 a.m. at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 19 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 91 per cent

Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, it will be windy with some rain in Hong Kong today and tomorrow with temperatures falling progressively. Temperatures in the urban areas will fall to a minimum of around 13 degrees tomorrow (2 April), and a couple of degrees lower in the New Territories. The weather will improve on Sunday during the day. It will be mainly fine and dry in the following few days. Members of the public should take note of the changes in weather and the latest weather forecast issued by the Observatory.

Please be reminded that:
The Strong Monsoon Signal has been issued.
